original_title: 1990 Cincinnati Reds: The Official World Series Film
overview: No one gave the Reds much of a chance against the Oakland A's. The four-game sweep everyone had predicted had, in fact, taken place. But it was Cincinnati, in one of baseball's all-time World Series upsets, who did the sweeping.
tagline: America Loves an Underdog. In 1990, America loved the Cincinnati Reds.
title: 1990 Cincinnati Reds: The Official World Series Film
